docs.snippet: Much of the attention is on two other Jets rookies, Geno Smith and Dee Milliner, but defensive lineman Sheldon Richardson is not complaining....
docs.lead_paragraph: Much of the attention is on two other Jets rookies, Geno Smith and Dee Milliner, but defensive lineman Sheldon Richardson is not complaining.
docs.abstract: New York Jets defensive lineman Sheldon Richardson is not getting as much attention as other two Jets rookies, Geno Smith and Dee Milliner, giving him the luxury of being a first-round draft choice who is breaking in largely unnoticed.

headline.main: Root Canal Aside, a Painless Start for a Jets Rookie
headline.print_headline: Jets’ Other Top Pick Is Happy to Be ‘the One They Don’t Know About’

docs.abstract: Dick Kazmaier, a Princeton halfback who won the Heisman Trophy in 1951 as the nation’s outstanding college football player, but who rejected a career in the National Football League, dies at age 82.
